raw.reasoning: success() checks entire dependency chain including build-base which is often skipped. Changed to always() + needs.build-and-push.result == 'success' to only check direct dependency

raw.question: Changed skipRestart from true to false
raw.chosen: Changed skipRestart from true to false
raw.reasoning: With skipRestart:true, running workspaces without active agents would only update config but not restart. Since no agents = no work to disrupt, should restart immediately to apply new image

retrospective.summary: Fixed update-workspaces job: 1) Changed condition to check direct dependency result instead of success() which fails on skipped upstream jobs 2) Set skipRestart:false so idle workspaces restart immediately
